long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,fi,hr,nl:
Best new tab extension for Chrome with minimalistic, light and dark theme, and fully customizable New Tab page with builtin todo list, clock, calendar, pomodoro, notes, weather and news. Improve your productivity with new tab browser extension Nova Tab with ChatGPT.

New tab with theme presets is blazing fast even on slow computers and comes with amazing features âœ¨
âœ…   To-do list, task management. Google Tasks, Todoist, Kanban
ğŸ“…   Calendar with Goolgle Calendar integraion Microsoft Calendar Outlook.
ğŸ”–   Bookmarks and Bookmarks Sidebar
ğŸ“°   News reader feed and RSS reader
ğŸ—’ï¸   Notepad with cloud sync
ğŸ…   Pomodoro timer 
ğŸŒ   Weather forecast. With detailed hourly weather forecast
ğŸª›   Customize New Tab as you like
ğŸ¤–   New Tab ChatGPT
ğŸ§˜â€â™€ï¸   Meditation exercise
ğŸï¸   Theme manager with live animated wallapers, and million of beautiful photo wallpapers 
ğŸ“±   Synchronization across devices
ğŸ’Ÿ   Inspirational quotes

Nova New Tab - The Best New Tab Extension for Google Chrome with ChatGPT and Google Calendar Integration

One of the standout features of our new tab is its seamless integration with Google Calendar. You can easily add your own calendars with public holidays and personal events such as birthdays. You can also use our calendars with upcoming game releases and movie releases. This feature allows you to stay organized and never miss an important event again.

But what sets Nova New Tab apart from other new tab extensions is its integration with ChatGPT, a cutting-edge language model that uses artificial intelligence to provide personalized responses to your inquiries. With it, you can access ChatGPT directly from your new tab page and get quick and accurate responses to your questions. This feature is incredibly useful for getting answers to your queries without having to leave your browsing session.

Nova New Tab has been named the best new tab extension for Google Chrome, and for good reason. With its powerful integrations, customizable features, and sleek design, it is the perfect tool to boost your productivity and enhance your browsing experience. Additionally, our new tab offers a range of other features such as a weather widget, RSS feed reader, and a built-in Pomodoro timer that helps you stay focused and productive.

Overall, Nova New Tab is the ultimate new tab extension for Google Chrome users. With its powerful integrations with Google Calendar and ChatGPT, it is the perfect extension for anyone looking to stay organized and get quick answers to their questions. Try it today and experience the difference for yourself!


âš« Minimal New tab design
Nova Tab comes already with a stylish and minimal design. But you can always customize every element of the browser New Tab as you wish. Use dark or light theme, change colors, background, size, direction, fonts, or even hide any element of your Chrome New Tab at all.

ğŸï¸ Theme manager quickly switch between dozends of new tab themes enjoy the retro outrun styled night road or 3d view on our solar system planets with real moon phase. Light and dark theme can also be configured with custom colors.

ğŸ–¼ï¸ Every time you open a blank New Tab it will inspire you with random beautiful wallpaper from a huge collection of daily wallpapers or you can use your own images as a wallpaper.

ğŸ“… Google Calendar and Microsoft calendar extension for Chrome
With seamless integration of  Google Calendar and Outlook calendar into the Chrome New Tab. You can Add your own google calendars with public holidays and personal events such as birthdays. But also use our calendars with upcoming game releases and movies releases.

âœ… Task manager extension for Chrome
Minimalistic New Tab todo list with intuitive and easy to use weekly/monthly/daily overview of your performance. Focus on your tasks and use the Pomodoro timer directly from the New Tab todo list. Track time you spent on each of your tasks with detailed Pomodoro statistics.

ğŸ”– Bookmarks extension for Chrome
Bookmark manager available directly from Chrome New tab will help you control your browser bookmarks like never before. Quickly search and sort your bookmark. Add bookmarks right from the New Tab. Or even manage your whole bookmark collections using our builtin bookmark sidebar manager.

ğŸ“° News Reader for Chrome.
Our RSS feed reader is fast and reliable and it is available directly from your Chrome New Tab. Read your favorite news using our intuitive and modern rss reader. 

ğŸŒ Weather is always visible in the lower left corner of the New Tab. Detailed weather forecast displayed in a dedicated New Tab page with daily and hourly weather information such as: humidity, wind speed, feels like, sunrise, sunset, and pressure.

ğŸ… Nova Tab is a Top Chrome extension also because of an amazing built-in Pomodoro timer.
Minimalistic pomodoro timer will help you divide your tasks into 25 minutes chunks. The name Pomodoro was inspired by the kitchen alarm that was shaped like a Pomodoro, which is Italian for tomato. It is cleverly integrated into the New tab todo list.

Download manager will show you your recent downloads right from the New Tab so you don't need to open any other windows.

Focuso Android app: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.focuso.android

Focuso iPhone app: 
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/focuso/id1537929520

Nova Minimal New tab with Todo list and calendar - Let nothing distract you from your productivity.
